mapper.insert:
replace into price_1d (symbol, date, source, open_time, close_time,open,height,close,low,volume,turnover,trading_volume,buying_volume,buying_turnover) VALUES
( #{it.date},#{it.source},#{it.symbol},#{it.openTime},#{it.closeTime},#{it.open},#{it.height}, #{it.close},#{it.low},#{it.volume},#{it.turnover},#{it.tradingVolume},#{it.buyingVolume},#{it.buyingTurnover})
